channel.title: Comments on: Double helping of Pi Hole

item.title: By: will
item.dc:creator: will
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2021/01/02/double-helping-of-pi-hole/#comment-3920">Marian</a>.
Sure, if you bring your computer on to my LAN and it's configured with DNS over HTTPS then you will successfully bypass my ad blocking and also be able to access YouTube. Congrats.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Marian.

Sure, if you bring your computer on to my LAN and it’s configured with DNS over HTTPS then you will successfully bypass my ad blocking and also be able to access YouTube. Congrats.

item.title: By: Marian
item.dc:creator: Marian
item.description: And all that will be bypassed by DNS over Https.
item.content:encoded: And all that will be bypassed by DNS over Https.
